docs.snippet: Zenit St. Petersburg have been penalised with a 3-0 technical defeat and fined one million roubles (17,180 pounds) after one of their fans punched Dynamo Moscow captain Vladimir Granat during their Russian Premier League encounter at the Petrovsky...
docs.lead_paragraph: Zenit St. Petersburg have been penalised with a 3-0 technical defeat and fined one million roubles (17,180 pounds) after one of their fans punched Dynamo Moscow captain Vladimir Granat during their Russian Premier League encounter at the Petrovsky Stadium, officials said.

docs.snippet: A man accused of punching a former Minnesota State, Mankato, football player in the head and knocking him to the ground was charged with two felony assault counts Wednesday after a weekend attack that left the former Mavericks linebacker in critic...
